titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B149b_03
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B149b_03

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

1.[ġlbm | ..yb | bn | dwsm | bn | qśmm | ṣyr | w-bqr | w-grb | w-bql | w-sqḥ | kl | ʾsrr-s | w-grwb-s] 2.[šbʿn | w-lgʾm | w-srʿ | w-yfʿ | w-kl | ʾbʾr-sm | w-ṯqwl-sm | w-mʾtw-sm | w-mbny-sm | w-grb | w-bq=] 3.[l | w-rʾb | b-sr-s | ḏ-rbḍt | w-mlgʾ-s | nḥql | ṯmnt | ʾʾlfm | bqlm | l-s | w-l | wld-s | w-ḏ-ʿḏr-] 4.[s | b-ʾmr | w-mqdm | ʿ]ṯtr | šrqn | w-ʿm | ḏ-dwnm | (w-)[nswr | w-ʾl | fḫr | w-b-rdʾ | šms-s | w-b-rdʾ | w-ʾḫ=] 5.[yl | ʾdm | bn | qśmm] | kl | šʿbn | ḏ-mrḥḍw | w-(m)[šrqytn | w-rṯd | ġlbm | ḏtn | ʾsṭrn | ʿṯtr | š=] 6.[rqn | w-ʿm | w-nswr | w-]ʾl | fḫr | bn-kl | ḫśśm | w-ḫb[lm | w-śnḥm | w-msfʾym | w-msnkrm | bn | ʾbrṯ-sm]

Text preserved in this photograph of the squeeze:
4.[ʿA]thtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and 5.the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Ma[...] 6.ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or de[face]
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields] 2.[of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with] 3.[crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍat and his tenant farmland, in particular 8000 bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,] 4.[at the command and direction of ʿA]thtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and [Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-] 5.[ces of the clients of Qāśimum]--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Ma[shraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-] 6.[riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and] ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or de[face or tamper with or destroy or remove (them) from their place.]

Text preserved in this photograph of the squeeze:
ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and
the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Ma...
ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface
Restored full text of the inscription:
Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields
of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with
crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍat and his tenant farmland, in particular
bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,
at the command and direction of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-
ces of the clients of Qāśimum--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Mashraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-
riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface or tamper with or destroy or remove them from their place.

Text preserved in this photograph of the squeeze:
ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and
the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Ma...
ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface
Restored full text of the inscription:
Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields
of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with
crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍat and his tenant farmland, in particular
bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,
at the command and direction of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-
ces of the clients of Qāśimum--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Mashraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-
riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface or tamper with or destroy or remove them from their place.

Text preserved in this photograph of the squeeze:
ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and
the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Ma...
ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface
Restored full text of the inscription:
Ghālibum ..yāb bin Dawsum of the lineage of Qāśimum has embanked and ploughed and terraced and planted with crops and set in order all of his valleys and his terraced fields
of Shabʿān and Lagiʾum and Sāriʿ and Yāfiʿ and all of their wells and their structures and their water channels and their buildings. And he has terraced and planted with
crops and harvested in his valley of Dhū-Rabaḍat and his tenant farmland, in particular
bql-units for himself and his children and his dependents,
at the command and direction of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʿAmm Dhū-Dawānum and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir , and with the aid of his goddess of protection, and with the aid and resour-
ces of the clients of Qāśimum--the entire tribe of Marḥaḍū and Mashraqiyyatān. And Ghālibum entrusted these inscriptions to ʿAthtar Shā-
riqān and ʿAmm and Niswār and ʾĪl-Fākhir against anyone who might damage or deface or tamper with or destroy or remove them from their place.
